features.featureTitle: Increase the maximum allowed file size for reel/video uploads on CreateReelPage (frontend/src/pages/CreateReelPage.tsx) from the current ~1.5–2 MB cap to at least 10 MB. Update the file size validation guard so that files up to 10 MB are accepted, and update the user-facing error message to reflect the new limit (e.g., 'File too large — please select a file under 10 MB'). The video preview, base64 encoding, and submission flow must continue to work correctly for larger files.
